tag.name: cfindex
tag.help:
Populates a Verity search engine collection with an index of documents on a file system or of CFML query result sets.
A collection must exist before it can be populated.

parameter.name: collection
parameter.help: Name of a collection that is registered by CFML; for example, "personnel" Name and absolute path of a collection that is not registered by CFML; for example: "e:\collections\personnel"

parameter.name: action
parameter.help: - update: updates a collection and adds key to the index. - delete: removes collection documents as specified by the key attribute. - purge: deletes all of the documents in a collection. Causes the collection to be taken offline, preventing searches. - refresh: deletes all of the documents in a collection, and then performs an update.

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: file: using the key attribute value of the query result as input, applies action value to filenames or filepaths. path: using the key attribute value of the query result as input, applies action to filenames or filepaths that pass the extensions filter custom: If action = "update" or "delete": applies action to custom entities in query results.

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: * Title for collection * Query column name for type and a valid query name Permits searching collections by title or displaying a separate title from the key

parameter.name: key
parameter.help:
* Absolute path and filename, if type = "file" * Absolute path, if type = "path" * A query column name (typically, the primary key column name), if type = "custom" * A query column name, if type = any other value
This attribute is required for the actions listed, unless you intend for its value to be an empty string.

parameter.name: body
parameter.help:
* ASCII text to index * Query column name(s), if name is specified in query
You can specify columns in a delimited list. For example: "emp_name, dept_name, location"

parameter.name: custom1
parameter.help: Custom field in which you can store data during an indexing operation. Specify a query column name for type, and a query name.

parameter.name: custom2
parameter.help: Custom field in which you can store data during an indexing operation. Specify a query column name for type, and a query name.

parameter.name: urlpath
parameter.help: If type="file" or "path", specifies the URL path. When the collection is searched with cfsearch, this pathname is prefixed to filenames and returned as the url attribute.

parameter.name: extensions
parameter.help:
Delimited list of file extensions that CFML uses to index files, if type = "Path". "*." returns files with no extension.
For example: the following code returns files with a listed extension or no extension: extensions = ".htm, .html, .cfm, .cfml, "*."

parameter.name: query
parameter.help: Query against which collection is generated

parameter.name: recurse
parameter.help: Yes: if type = "path", directories below the path specified in key are included in indexing operation

parameter.name: language
parameter.help: For options, see cfcollection. Requires the appropriate Verity Locales language pack (Western Europe, Asia, Multilanguage, Eastern Europe/Middle Eastern).

parameter.name: status
parameter.help: The name of the structure into which ColdFusion MX returns status information.
